name: Vlobs
description:
Vlobs is a relaxing casual puzzle game where you build groups of colorful blobs (vlobs) that connect to each other in specific ways. Figure out the mechanics, improve your strategies and see how far you can go before you fill up the board. Get far enough and you'll encounter new colors, new mechanics, mysterious powers and maybe even unlock a second game mode.

Features

  • Connecting colorful blobs.
  • Relaxing and (mildly) addictive gameplay.
  • Sound and music.
  • Your own personal highscore!
  • Multiple levels with increasing complexity and new mechanics.
  • Unlockable second game mode.
  • Mysterious special powers.
  • No online features, no multiplayer and no microtransactions!
